parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate or party.  It promotes the "Romania Eficienta" project, which focuses on energy efficiency and is not directly related to any political campaign or candidate.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, aiming to reach a wide audience interested in energy efficiency in Romania. The reach estimate is ">1M", indicating a broad target.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to promote the "Romania Eficienta" project and its activities related to energy efficiency. There is no evidence suggesting an intention to influence the outcome of the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of public awareness campaign, similar to journalistic efforts to inform the public about important societal issues. It provides information about the project's goals, activities, and funding sources.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post doesn't express personal opinions; it presents factual information about a project.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>458228789955539</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes the "Romania Eficienta" project, an initiative focused on energy efficiency.  While the post is a paid advertisement with a wide reach, its content is informational and educational, not promotional of any candidate or party participating in the parliamentary elections. The project's goals and activities are clearly stated, and there is no attempt to influence voters' choices in the election. The timing of the post, even if after the official campaign period, is irrelevant because the content is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Romania Eficienta</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
